concept.title: CC-Request-Number AVP support in the NCC Gy interface

section.title: Overview
section.p: The CC-Request-Number AVP is of type Unsigned32 and identifies this request within one session.
During a call, the CC-Request-Number AVP in Credit-Control-Request should start from 0 (Zero) at CCR-I, else an alarm is generated.
CC-Request-Number AVP in further CCR-Update/Termination request follows incremental sequence while sending messages through Gy interface.
